title: The Exceptional child
brief_description: A report on studies of children of unusual natural abilities or rate of development made in Great Britain, the United States and South Africa. Covers very rapid mental development, reading difficulties, stammering, accident proneness and delinquency, and evidence for pre-natal influence on these.
